ygData.msgSnippet: The Trainer base is being attacked should be the first clue that she s involved. I ve gone back through and found a few others. there was this one ... From:

The Trainer base is being attacked should be the first clue that she's
involved. I've gone back through and found a few others.

there was this one

----- Original Message -----
From: CYBERWOLF4
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 4:36 AM
Subject: Re: The Destrocons arrive!


The trainer base continues to shake. Ignatius opens a comm to Zoe, "Get
ready for unwelcome visitors,." Again and again the base shook as it was
pummled by the missles. The mines continued chaseing SkyWarp. the cannons
detect more movement and continue thier defense by fireing at any bot moving
outside the Trainer base.


and this one.
----- Original Message -----
From: CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 7:55 AM
Subject: Re: Attack the Trainers


> There are no Trainers outside the base, Ignatius and Zoe are inside
preying
> to whatever gods will listen that the Preds won't get in while they're
short
> handed.
>
> You are here   \/
>
>                         In a small gap between the sand and the Trainer
base
> Cygnars shots strike the side of the base causing dents to form. Ignatius
> detects the damage but doesn't have any defenses capable of getting
beneath
> the ship. "Close all blast doors on the lower level and arm internal
> defenses to repel anyone who you don't recognize."
>
> Quickly more shots struck the side. stress cracks were beginning to form.
> The three bots at the side were causing havoc to the superstructure of the
> Trainer base.(Cygnar Drillbit, and Killfest)
>
> two mini gattling guns lower from the ceiling taking aim and begin fireing
> at Zoe, She had been welcomed by Slayer and Ignatius but hadn't been
> identified by Prebon or Blaze. In the computers eye that made her no more
> recognized than the attackers.
>
> Meanwhile the auto defenses outside continue fireing at the Destrocons.

and possably a few more that I already deleted.
